Title: Podiatric Surgeon
Education: Temple University School of Podiatric Medicine
Residencies: Chief Resident of Podiatric Medicine and Surgery & Reconstructive Foot/Ankle Surgery - Grant Medical Center in Columbus, OH
Professional Memberships: Associate of American College of Foot and Ankle Surgeons
Description: Dr. Shah is originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. She attended a highly demanding podiatric residency program in Columbus, Ohio under the direction of top foot and ankle surgeons. During her training, she had the privilege to present at national conferences throughout the country on original research projects. Dr. Shah’s strong medical and surgical training allow her to treat a wide variety of foot and ankle ailments. She has a keen interest in sports medicine, ankle injuries, and diabetic limb salvage.

Title: General Surgeon
Education: Universidad Nacional Pedro Henríquez Ureña
Residencies: Methodist Hospital of Dallas
Description: Dr. Lebron is board certified in general surgery and completed his general surgery residency at Methodist Hospital of Dallas. Since 2010 he has been recognized by the Consumers’ Research Council of America as one of America’s Top Surgeons. His scope of experience and expertise includes single site robotic surgery, general intra-abdominal pathology, colon cancer, benign and malignant breast disease, advanced laparoscopic surgery, complex hernia repair, hemorrhoid, rectal fistulas, parathyroid and thyroid surgery, skin cancer and surgical oncology.

Title: Orthopedic Surgeon
Education: University of Texas, Medical Branch at Galveston, TX (1994)
Residencies: Medical University of South Carolina, Department of Orthopedic Surgery (1999)
Description: Dr. John M. Hibbitts, a Texas orthopedic surgeon, has been helping patients recover from pain and injury for over 25 years. He and his team treat chronic conditions and injuries of the shoulders, hips, and knees using a variety of surgical techniques.

Title: Otolaryngologist (ENT) and Sleep Medicine Specialist
Education: Medical College of Wisconsin Affiliated Hospitals, Residency, Otolaryngology, 2004 - 2009
Medical College of Wisconsin Affiliated Hospitals, Internship, General Surgery
University of Utah, PhD, Engineering
Professional Affiliations: American Board of Otolaryngology - Head and Neck Surgery, Otolaryngology
American Board of Otolaryngology - Head and Neck Surgery, Sleep Medicine
Description: Dr. Arun Badi is a practicing Otolaryngologist (ENT) and Sleep Medicine Specialist. As one of the very few dual Board Certified Otolaryngologist and Sleep Medicine Specialist in Texas, he offers comprehensive nonsurgical and surgical treatment of Sleep Apnea and Snoring in adults and children.

Title: General & Bariatric Surgeon
Education: Damascus University
Residencies: St Elizabeth Health Center
Description: Bassam J. Zakhour, M.D., is board certified in both general and bariatric surgery. He attended medical school at Damascus University and completed his residency at St. Elizabeth Hospital Medical Center.

Title: General Surgeon
Education: American University Of Beirut
Residencies: Temple Univ. School of Medicine
Description: Dr. Stephan completed his General Surgery Residency at Conemaugh Valley Memorial Hospital in Johnstown, Pennsylvania / Temple University School of Medicine Philadelphia, Pennsylvania in 1980. He completed a Fellowship in Cardiovascular Surgery at Baylor College of Medicine in Houston, Texas in 1981. Dr. Stephan is board certified by the American Board of Surgery in General Surgery.

Title: Pain Medicine
Education: University of Miami Miller School of Medicine
Residencies: David Grant Medical Center - Internal Medicine
San Antonio Uniformed Services Health Education Consortium - Anesthesiology
Board Certifications: American Board of Anesthesiology - Certified in Anesthesiology
American Board of Anesthesiology - Certified in Pain Medicine
Description: Dr. Schade started his medical career in the United States Air Force. He completed his internship in Internal Medicine at David Grant United States Air Force Medical Center in California. He then relocated to San Antonio, Texas, and completed his residency in Anesthesiology and Pain Medicine at Wilford Hall United States Air Force Medical Center. Dr. Schade is an opinion leader in pain medicine, has published multiple articles, and is a frequent speaker at medical conferences. Visit cmschade.com for more information.

Title: Podiatric Surgeon
Education: Doctorate in Podiatric Medicine from William M Scholl College of Podiatric Medicine in Chicago, IL
Residencies: Podiatric medicine and reconstructive rear foot and ankle surgery at James A Haley VA Hospital
Board Certifications: American Board of Multiple Specialties in Podiatric Medicine (ABMSP) - Diabetic Wound Care
American Board of Multiple Specialties in Podiatric Medicine (ABMSP) - Foot and Ankle Surgery
Description: Dr. Michael Birau is board certified in Diabetic wound care by the American Board of Multiple Specialties in Podiatric Medicine (ABMSP). He is also board qualified in Foot and Ankle surgery by the ABMSP. He is an active member of the American Society of Podiatric Surgery and American Podiatric Medical Association.

Title: Podiatric Surgeon
Education: Ohio College of Podiatric Medicine, Cleveland
Residencies: Hunt Regional Medical Center
Description: Dr. Will Arrington graduated from the Texas A&M University – College Station with a Bachelor of Science degree in Biomedical Science. He then attended the Ohio College of Podiatric Medicine in Cleveland. During his education, he had the opportunity to work at the Veterans Hospital in Cleveland and Brecksville. After receiving his degree in Podiatric Medicine, he completed his podiatric medicine & surgical residency in Dallas.

Title: Gastroenterologist
Education: Dow Medical College, Karachi, Pakistan
Residencies: Internal Medicine, Wayne State University, Detroit, Michigan
Gastroenterology, William Beaumont Hospital, Royal Oak, Michigan (Fellowship)
Board Certifications: American Osteopathic Board of Internal Medicine
Description: I have always been fascinated by science, and in particular, medicine. My inspiration has been from seeing my uncle, a surgeon, and my older brother, a physician, practice medicine. I believe that the best way to connect with my patients is to give them enough time to share their concerns and to actively listen to them. I have practiced gastroenterology for more than 21 years, allowing me to gain a comprehensive knowledge of gastrointestinal diseases and their complex presentations. Over the past 21 years, I have performed thousands of procedures to treat digestive disorders.

Title: Orthopedic Surgeon
Education: Medical Degree from Stanford University, Stanford CA.
Residencies: Orthopedic Surgery residency at Howard University, Washington D.C.
Fellowship: Fellowship in total joint reconstruction at the Prisma Health Steadman Hawkins Clinic, Greenville SC
Professional Affiliations: Fellow of the American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons (FAAOS)
American Association of Hip and Knee Surgeons
Description: Dr. Obi Osuji and his team prioritize conservative treatment for hip, knee, and shoulder pain, reserving surgery for when necessary. They are experts in joint replacement surgery, sports injuries, and orthopedic trauma. Advanced treatments like PRP therapy are also available that promote healing, ease pain, and restore mobility.

Title: Podiatric Surgeon
Education: University of North Texas
Barry University in Miami, FL
Residencies: University of Texas Health Science Center, San Antonio
Description: After growing up in North Dallas, Dr. Justin Wade graduated from Austin College, where he earned his B.A. in Biology in 2002. He went on to receive his M.S. in Kinesiology at the University of North Texas in 2004 before pursuing his medical training. In 2008, Dr. Wade graduated from Barry University in Miami, FL, with his DPM degree, and then he completed his residency training at the University of Texas Health Science Center in San Antonio in 2011.

Title: Vascular Surgeon
Education: Undergraduate: Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD
Medical School: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center, Dallas, TX
Residency: St. Paul Medical Center, Dallas, TX
Fellowship: Good Samaritan Hospital Cincinnati, OH
Description: Dr. Rizwan H. Bukhari, MD, FACS is board certified in Vascular Surgery by the American Board of Surgery and has 20+ years of experience treating vascular patients. He strives to provide the highest quality of care for each of his patients by treating each of them with dignity, respect, and by offering the best care possible.

Title: Plastic Surgeon
Education: School of Medicine at the University of Guadalajara, Mexico.
Jalisco Institute for Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery University of Guadalajara, Mexico.
Board certified by the Mexican Board of Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery.
Fellowship in Craniomaxillofacial surgery with the World Craniofacial Foundation at Medical City Dallas.
Professional Affiliations: American Society of Plastic Surgeons, Associate
International Confederation of Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery
Mexican Society of Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery
International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery
American Society of Craniofacial Surgeons, Associate
Description: Dr. Carlos Raul Barceló is a board-certified plastic surgeon with nearly 35 years of experience in plastic, cosmetic, and reconstructive surgery with an impressive list of credentials. Craniofacial surgery and body sculpting are two of his key areas of interest. Breast augmentation, breast lift, breast reduction, body contouring, liposuction, stomach tuck, gluteal augmentation, and other procedures are among his specializations. Dr. Barceló's minimal vertical scar mastopexy, calf implants, butt enlargement, body contouring, and liposuction methods have won him international recognition. Dr. Barceló has a strong foundation in craniofacial surgery and rhinology, which allows him to perform facial procedures such as mid and mini facelifts, neck lifts, nose reconstruction, cheek implants, and upper and lower blepharoplasty. He also provides injectables like Botox®, Restylane®, Radiesse®, and Juvéderm® to reduce dynamic wrinkles and restore youthful volume.

Title: Anesthesiologist
Education: Kempegowda Institute of Medical Sciences, Bangalore, India
Residencies: Albany Medical Center - Anesthesiology
Mount Sinai Beth Israel - Anesthesiology
Description: Dr. Nagaraj Kikkeri is a board-certified anesthesiologist, specializing in pain medicine in the North Texas Area for over fifteen years. After graduating from Kempegowda Institute of Medical Sciences in Bangalore, India, Dr. Kikkeri completed his residency at Beth Israel Medical Center in Manhattan, NY. Dr. Kikkeri’s pain practice focuses on an intervention-based approach to pain with a conservative approach to prescribing medications.

Title: Urologist
Specialties: Female Pelvic Health and Bladder Pain
Female and Male Incontinence including Slings
Education: Johns Hopkins University, Residency, Urology, 2009 - 2014
Johns Hopkins University, Internship, Transitional Year, 2008 - 2009
Washington University School of Medicine in St. Louis, Class of 2008
Description: Dr. Anusionwu, MD is a board-certified Urologist with special interests and training in various urological areas, including female pelvic health and bladder pain, reconstructive surgery, BPH treatments including Urolift, minimally invasive prostate treatments, female and male incontinence including slings, Interstim/sacral neuromodulation, artificial urinary sphincter, erectile dysfunction and low testosterone, men’s health and penile curvature, kidney stones, prostate cancer screening, and sexual dysfunction.

Title: Podiatric Surgeon
Education: Kent State University College of Podiatric Medicine
Residencies: Chief Resident of Podiatric Medicine and Surgery & Reconstructive Rearfoot/Ankle Surgery – Sisters of Charity Hospital in Buffalo, NY
Professional Memberships: American College of Foot and Ankle Surgeons
Description: Dr. Hussain is a foot and ankle surgeon with a keen interest in sports medicine, bunions, hammertoes, as well as clinically integrated diabetic wound care and limb treatments. He received his B.S. at the University of North Texas and completed his residency as Chief Resident of Podiatric Medicine and Surgery & Reconstructive Rearfoot/Ankle Surgery at Sisters of Charity Hospital in Buffalo, NY. Dr. Hussain was voted the “Best Podiatrist in Rockwall/Rowlett” in 2016 and 2018.

Title: Orthopedic Surgeon
Education: Stanford University School of Medicine
Residencies: Orthopedic Surgery at University of Rochester
Description: Dr. Port received his medical degree from Stanford University School of Medicine in 1983. He completed his surgical residency in Orthopedic Surgery at the University of Rochester. He is Board Certified by the American Board of Orthopedic Surgery, as well as re-certified twice. He is also a member of the Texas Orthopaedic Association and American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons. His specialties include orthopedic surgery and joint reconstruction.

Title: Otolaryngologist
Education: University of Texas Medical Branch at Galveston
Residencies: Medical College of Wisconsin
Description: Dr. Brent Metts is a Board Certified Otolaryngologist who has completed a Fellowship in Endocrine-Head and Neck Surgery, where he learned the latest in surgical management of Thyroid Disease using minimally invasive techniques.

Title: Anesthesiologist
Education: American University of Antigua
Residencies: Wayne State University - Detroit, Michigan - Anesthesiology, Fellowship in Interventional Pain Medicine
Description: Dr. Sandhu is a male pain specialist who uses a multimodal approach to treatment, with a focus on function and quality of life. He has special interests in neuromodulation and regenerative medicine.

Title: Colorectal Surgeon
Education: University of Missouri - Columbia, Missouri
Residencies: Residency in General Surgery, Wilford Hall USAF Medical Center - San Antonio, Texas
Professional Affiliations: American Board Of Colon & Rectal Surgery
Description: Dr. Downs is a male colorectal surgeon and the program director for the residency program in colon & rectal surgery at Parkland and Texas Health Presbyterian Hospitals in Dallas. He has conducted his private practice as a part of Texas Colon & Rectal Specialists since 1993.

Title: Urologist
Education: Chicago Medical School at Rosalind Franklin University
Residencies: Medical College of Wisconsin Affiliated Hospitals
Description: Dr. Johnston is a female urologist board certified by the American Board of Urology. She received her medical degree from the Rosalind Franklin University of Medicine and Science at the Chicago Medical School in 2000 with specialty training in Female Urology and Sexual Dysfunction and Male Infertility and Sexual Dysfunction. Dr. Johnston has been in private practice for the past 15 years.

Title: Obstetrician-Gynecologist
Education: American University of Beirut Faculty of Medicine
Professional Affiliations: Baylor Scott and White Medical Center - Sunnyvale
Description: Dr. Sami Constantine, MD is a male Obstetrics & Gynecology Specialist in Mesquite, TX and has over 46 years of experience in the medical field.

Title: Gastroenterologist
Education: Touro University Nevada College of Osteopathic Medicine
Residencies: Touro University Nevada College of Osteopathic Medicine
Board Certifications: American Osteopathic Board of Internal Medicine
Description: Dr. Masrour grew up in Dallas, TX, he attended the University of Texas, Dallas and received his degree in Biology. He then went on to earn his medical degree from Touro University, NV followed by Internal Medicine residency at Plaza Medical Center in Fort Worth, TX. He then completed his Gastroenterology fellowship at University of North Texas/Plaza Medical Center and John Peter Smith Hospital. Dr. Masrour is a board certified physician along with being a member of the American College of Gastroenterology.

Title: Orthopedic Spine Surgeon
Education: University of California, San Diego
Residencies: University of California, San Diego
Description: Dr. Indresano is a male expert in surgical spinal care for spinal pathology at all levels of the spine, including the cervical, thoracic and lumbar spine. He has expertise in both traditional and state-of-the-art minimally invasive techniques. He is an expert at routine spine surgery as well as complex spinal reconstruction and deformity surgeries, including scoliosis and revision surgery for patients who have undergone previous spinal surgery without success. Dr. Indresano believes in aiding the body to heal itself through conservative treatment options such as anti-inflammatory medications, physical therapy, aquatic therapy, massage, injection therapy, acupuncture, chiropractic care, and ultrasound whenever possible.
